product_name: Mammut Cartridge Refillable 207 Bar Alu - Empty
long_description: An essential part of the Mammut avalanche airbag system, the Mammut Cartridge Refillable 207 Bar Alu rapidly inflates the airbag in compatible Mammut ABS packs (sold separately) during an avalanche. Cartridge is empty on delivery. Fill with dry air; fill/refill at an authorized retail location; most dive shops or paint ball shops offer 207bar/3000psi dry air. Filling pressure is controlled via integrated pressure gauge.
short_description: An essential part of the Mammut avalanche airbag system, the Mammut Cartridge Refillable 207 Bar Alu rapidly inflates the airbag in compatible Mammut ABS packs (sold separately) during an avalanche.
